name: Deprogramming Occult Psychological Attacks
description: Strategies to detect, resist, and reverse engineered occult-based psychological assaults.

cards.title: Recognizing Occult Psychological Warfare Tactics
cards.description: Understanding how esoteric knowledge is weaponized for psychological control.
bulletpoints: Analyzing symbolic encoding in controlled narratives.
Detecting trauma reinforcement techniques used in mind control programming.
Identifying fear-based manipulation tactics designed to create obedience.
cards.summaryText: Maps how symbolic scripts, trauma loops, and fear narratives are choreographed to lock victims into compliance.

cards.title: Neutralizing Trauma-Based Mind Control
cards.description: Breaking the cycle of trauma reinforcement and cognitive dissonance.
bulletpoints: Reversing the psychological effects of engineered trauma responses.
Using emotional detachment techniques to remove the impact of psychological conditioning.
Applying self-hypnosis and guided mental exercises to reclaim autonomy.
cards.summaryText: Focuses on unwinding induced trauma, cultivating emotional distance, and leveraging self-guided practices to restore autonomy.

cards.title: Psychic Armor and Mental Shielding
cards.description: Building internal defenses against psychological and energetic attacks.
bulletpoints: Developing cognitive shielding against external influence.
Using visualization and reinforcement techniques to fortify mental barriers.
Employing energetic grounding practices to maintain mental stability.
cards.summaryText: Details cognitive shielding, protective visualizations, and grounding rituals to repel psychological and energetic attacks.
